plot: Jae-hun is separated from his wife temporarily when hs work takes him to the other side of the nation. Although he tries to be faithful to his spouse, people begin to believe that he is having an affair.
title: Nampyeon
plot_es: Jae-hun is separated from his wife temporarily when hs work takes him to the other side of the nation. Although he tries to be faithful to his spouse, people begin to believe that he is having an affair.
plot_en: Jae-hun is separated from his wife temporarily when hs work takes him to the other side of the nation. Although he tries to be faithful to his spouse, people begin to believe that he is having an affair.
